text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @NYCMayor News you can use @POTUS - every State in this country will have to make cuts to annual budgets because of the #coronavirus . It’s either that or raise taxes when most citizens are already hit in the wallet by the #TrumpVirus .

Get it? Does a failed businessman get it?
